Welcome to MurCSS’s documentation!¶

This is only the API documentation. If you need more information about how the tool works please refer to the project’s wiki: https://code.zmaw.de/projects/miklip-d-integration/wiki/Overview or the evaluation system webpage: https://www-miklip.dkrz.de/about/murcss

author:Sebastian Illing
contact:sebastian.illing@met.fu-berlin.de
